resources.string: Do you want to remove the command:\n\"%s\"?
The SMS command contain following parameters:\n%s\nDo you want to modify them?
You have not sellected any GPS contact to send the message!

Set your GPS tracker phone number.

If you appreciate this application, please do a donation!\nPressing YES button, you will be sent using your default browser to a PayPal donnation page.\nThank you for using this application!

string.name: about_text
string.Data:
Application version: %s
I created this application to easily send SMS commands to a TK 102 GPS tracker or other tracking device which use the SMS messages for the configuration.
Application is created to support and send the same message to multiple GPS in same time. The user can manage a list of GPS into the Settings. Before the message to be sent all GPS contacts appear as a check box list, the message will be sent only to selected contacts.
This application only send SMS messages to the GPS and do not interpret the GPS SMS response.

The command messages can contain parameters, each parameter should have on front and at the end the ? character.
e.g. ?password? or ?speed?
The \'password\' parrameter is a special parameter and is replaced with the proper GPS password when the messages is sent.

The user can define own parameters and commands, can be modified or deleted existing commands also. Each parameter value is saved into application preferences and are available when it\'s needed.

When the message is sent to the GPS tracker the parameters are replaced with the specified values.

Thank you for using this application!

Change log:
Version 1.8
- Refactored the OK and Cancel buttons positions.

Version 1.7
- Added support for multiple GPS trackers.

Version 1.6.1
- Fixed the history hour time to show in 24h format.

Version 1.6
- Replaced the long click with simple click to access the context menu.

Version 1.5
- Fixed the save and load history list processes.

Version 1.4
- Added support to send SMS commands from history.

Version 1.3
- Added the history support to store the sended messages.

Version 1.2
- Modified the command description editor field to be more visible the text on dialog window.

Version 1.1
- Fixed the loading process.

Version 1.0
- First version.
